alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Livingston; St. John The Baptist; Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 3:27PM CDT until June 10 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. John The Baptist Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Ascension Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southeastern Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... South central Tangipahoa Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whitehall, or 11 miles east of Gonzales, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... French Settlement, Port Vincent, Whitehall and Killian. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 18. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ascension; Livingston; St. John The Baptist; Tangipahoa
